page.title: 17HOMES AND HOUSES IN RUNCORN
page.content: Windmill Hill is a housing estate situated in the North-east corner of the Runcorn New Town adjacent to the Bridgewater Canal. The housing provided on Windmill Hill is mainly council property,although some private housing is presently being built.The council homes are a mixture of bungalows,houses and flats.The houses have a single pitched roof and are faced in red brick. Some of the larger bungalows have traditional pitched roofs. The flats are in blocks of six, each block beihg three storeys high.The houses and bungalows have relatively small open plan front gardens ahd private gardens to the rear.The flats do not have gardens.Car parking areas are provided near all properties but there are no garage facilities available in this area.
